system.description: You utter a single word of power that causes one creature of your choice to become blinded, whether the creature can hear the word or not. Duration: 50 hp or less — permanent; 51-100 hp — 1d4+1 minutes; 101-200 hp — 1d4+1 rounds. Any creature with 201 or more hit points is unaffected.
system.target: One creature with 200 hp or less
